7. Libra - 8/10 - Harmony, balance, and diplomacy excel, but may be indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Passionate intensity, intuition, and loyalty shine, but may be intense.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Optimism, enthusiasm, and exploration soar, but may lack grounding.
